wikipedia_page.main: Ian Dalziel (born 24 October 1962) is an English former footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Derby County, Hereford United and Carlisle United. He later played for Gateshead.He was assistant manager at Morecambe from September 2000 to November 2001.

response: *  1962   – Ian Dalziel, English footballer and manager
